text: The White Gloves (Persian: Dastkeshe sefid) is a 1951 Iranian comedy film directed by Parviz Khatibi.Issari p.268 ==Cast== * Rogheyeh Chehreh-Azad * Hamid Ghanbari as Hamid == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. Cinema in Iran, 1900-1979. Scarecrow Press, 1989. == External links == * Category:1951 films Category:Iranian comedy films Category:Persian-language films Category:Iranian films
title: The White Gloves
